name: Siffrin
note:
<Battle Status Window Skin: Window_flash>
<Replace Attack: 7>
<Replace Attack: AttackS>

<Custom Face Image Eval>
if ($gameSwitches.value(37)) {
    //if timestopped
	if (user.isStateAffected(19)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_3';
	faceIndex = 6;

	//if dead
	} else if (user.isStateAffected(1)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_3';
	faceIndex = 5;

	//if attacking
	} else if (user.isStateAffected(54)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_3';
	faceIndex = 2;

	//if healed/buffed
	} else if (user.isStateAffected(52)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_3';
	faceIndex = 1;

	//if taking damage
	} else if (user.isStateAffected(53)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_3';
	faceIndex = 3;

	//if 30%hp left
	} else if (user.hp / user.mhp <= 0.3) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_3';
	faceIndex = 4;

	//if basic
	} else {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_3';
	faceIndex = 0;
	}
} else if($gameVariables.value(2) >= 6)
{
	//if dead
	if (user.isStateAffected(1)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_3';
	faceIndex = 20;

	//if attacking
	} else if (user.isStateAffected(54)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_3';
	faceIndex = 18;

	//if healed/buffed
	} else if (user.isStateAffected(52)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_3';
	faceIndex = 17;

	//if taking damage
	} else if (user.isStateAffected(53)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_3';
	faceIndex = 19;

	//if 30%hp left
	} else if (user.hp / user.mhp <= 0.3) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_3';
	faceIndex = 20;

	//if basic
	} else {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_3';
	faceIndex = 16;
	}

} else if($gameVariables.value(2) >=3)
{
	//if timestopped
	if (user.isStateAffected(19)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_2';
	faceIndex = 18;

	//if dead
	} else if (user.isStateAffected(1)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_2';
	faceIndex = 17;

	//if attacking
	} else if (user.isStateAffected(54)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_2';
	faceIndex = 14;

	//if healed/buffed
	} else if (user.isStateAffected(52)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_2';
	faceIndex = 13;

	//if taking damage
	} else if (user.isStateAffected(53)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_2';
	faceIndex = 15;

	//if 30%hp left
	} else if (user.hp / user.mhp <= 0.3) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_2';
	faceIndex = 16;

	//if basic
	} else if (user.hp / user.mhp <= 1) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_2';
	faceIndex = 12;
	}

} else
{
	//if timestopped
	if (user.isStateAffected(19)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_1';
	faceIndex = 6;

	//if dead
	} else if (user.isStateAffected(1)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_1';
	faceIndex = 5;

	//if attacking
	} else if (user.isStateAffected(54)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_1';
	faceIndex = 2;

	//if healed/buffed
	} else if (user.isStateAffected(52)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_1';
	faceIndex = 1;

	//if taking damage
	} else if (user.isStateAffected(53)) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_1';
	faceIndex = 3;

	//if 30%hp left
	} else if (user.hp / user.mhp <= 0.3) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_1';
	faceIndex = 4;

	//if basic
	} else if (user.hp / user.mhp <= 1) {
	faceName = 'xxx_battle_1';
	faceIndex = 0;
	}
}
</Custom Face Image Eval>
<Japanese Translation>
[name]:シフラン
</Japanese Translation>
